title: Accounts
lede: Manage company accounts and organizations with multiple contacts and relationships.

sections.title: Account Management
sections.content:
Organize contacts under company accounts for better relationship management.

Account Features:

  • Company Profiles: Detailed organization information
  • Contact Relationships: Link multiple contacts to accounts
  • Account Hierarchy: Parent-child account relationships
  • Account Activities: Track all account interactions

sections.title: Account Operations
sections.content:
Manage account lifecycle and relationships efficiently.

  • Account Creation: Manual and automatic account creation
  • Contact Assignment: Assign contacts to accounts
  • Account Campaigns: Target entire organizations
  • Reporting: Account-level performance metrics
